title: [HOLD for payment 2025-01-28] [$250] Bank account - Search query in State page is not cleared after exiting State list
issue_repo_steps:

Go to staging.new.expensify.com 2. Go to workspace settings > Workflows. 3. Click Connect bank account > Connect manually. 4. Proceed to address page in Personal info. 5. Click State. 6. Enter any search query. 7. Click RHP back button. 8. Click State again. ## Expected Result: The search query made in Step 6 should be cleared after exiting State list. ## Actual Result: The search query made in Step 6 persists after exiting State list. ## Workaround: Unknown ## Platforms: - [x] Android: Standalone - [x] Android: HybridApp - [x] Android: mWeb Chrome - [x] iOS: Standalone - [x] iOS: HybridApp - [x] iOS: mWeb Safari - [x] MacOS: Chrome / Safari - [x] MacOS: Desktop ## Screenshots/Videos https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/276c6da5-ddc4-4162-8f4f-b79380d36dd8 [View all open jobs on GitHub](https://github.com/Expensify/App/issues?q=is%3Aopen+is%3Aissue+label%3A%22Help+Wanted%22)
